=== Workspace Idea #2 ===
<nowiki>[[File:normalState.jpg]]</nowiki>

This concept is based upon the idea of static and dynamic workspaces. The upper row is for dynamic windows: When a window which was closed there is opend it will open on the current workspace. Is a window moved to a static workspace all windows of this process will open there until you disable it.

<nowiki>[[File:movingWindow.jpg]]</nowiki>
